name: SelectableRegion
desc: A widget that introduces an area for user selections.

fields.name: magnifierConfiguration
fields.desc: The configuration for the magnifier used with selections in this region.

fields.name: child
fields.desc: The child widget this selection area applies to.

fields.name: selectionControls
fields.desc: The delegate to build the selection handles and toolbar for mobile devices.

fields.name: onSelectionChanged
fields.desc: Called when the selected content changes.
